title: Let’s Stay Together
lyrics:
(Let's stay—)
Woah
(Let's—)
Hey
(Let's—)
You're all I like, you're all I want
You're all I need, you're all I love

I'm not that type of guy
To be sayin' you love me when you hate me
Everything seems so wrong
When this relationship seemed to be strong
Holdin' hands, makin' all sorts of plans
When it doesn't mean a thing to you
If we try to get along, I said I'll sing the same old song
Maybe things'll be right for me and you

If we stay together (Let's stay together)
Maybe things will be the same (Maybe things will be the same)
Give me a chance to love you like never before (A chance to love you like never before)
Oh, yeah

We go out on Friday night
We don't have to argue and fight
You go your way and I'll go mine
Maybe we both will be fine (Let's—)
Then you try to go out with another guy
He don't understand you like I do (Let's—, let's—)
So, give me another try and I'll show you why
Why I think it should be me and you

If we stay together (Let's stay together)
Maybe things will be the same (Maybe things will be the same)
Give me a chance to love you like never before (A chance to love you like never before)
Oh, yes

You don't know how I feel about you
There's nothing in the world that I won't do for you (Stay)
I'll give you all my money and all my time
Can't you see I'm trying?
So, baby, please stay (Baby, please stay)
Hey, hey (Let's—)
(Baby, please stay)
Oh, baby, baby, baby (Let's—)
Oh, yeah

Baby, let's stay together (Let's stay together)
Maybe things will be the same (Maybe things will be the same)
Give me a chance to love you like never before (A chance to love you like never before)
Oh
Baby, let's stay together (Let's stay together)
Oh, baby, it will be the same (Maybe things will be the same)
Give me the chance to love you (A chance to love you like never before)
Love you all night long
(Baby, please stay)
Baby, let's stay together (Stay, stay)
It will be the same, oh, yes (Stay, stay)
Oh, yeah, stay with me (Stay, stay)
Stay with me forever
Let's stay together forever, baby
